var.name: rain_adj
var.description: Monthly factor to adjust measured precipitation on each HRU to account for differences in elevation, etc

var.name: snow_adj
var.description: Monthly factor to adjust measured precipitation on each HRU to account for differences in elevation, etc

var.name: strain_adj
var.description: Monthly factor to adjust measured precipitation to each HRU to account for differences in elevation, etc. This factor is for the rain gage used for kinematic or storm routing
